name: Umbrellavator
description:
Hi! This is the game that I (Chris from GoofGamesUK) made for the first Twitch MicroJam!
https://itch.io/jam/twitch-microjam-1

-This game was made in 8 hours on Twitch (twitch.tv/goofgamesuk) using premade assets from https://opengameart.org/ and https://game-icons.net/

-Music was sourced from https://incompetech.com/

Game description:
-Umbrellavator: In this very simple game, the player must time their left-clicks correctly to transfer power from the generator all the way to a little umbrella activator. There are 5 levels with varying gimmicks and the player must complete each level without running out of battery (game resets to level 1 on failure).
